projects.name: meditat.io
projects.description: meditat.io - is a complex application that serves as a platform for online lessons, predestined for students from the Republic of Moldova. The frontend of the application was written with React JS, and the backend with Node.Js.

projects.name: Grocery Cart
projects.description: This application serves as an online store for fruits and vegetables, allowing users to easily add desired products to their shopping cart. The application is written in JavaScript and utilizes the browser's local memory to store and retrieve data.

projects.name: msc:everywhere
projects.description: This application is designed for music storage and playback. It was developed using the jQuery library, which facilitates communication with server endpoints implemented in PHP.

projects.name: Find A Coach
projects.description: This application provides users with the ability to find mentors in various domains such as Frontend, Backend, and Career, or register as a mentor to connect with other users. It was developed utilizing the Vue.js framework and utilizes a Firebase database for data storage.
